explains: adj. 自私自利的，自私的

sentences.en: You should reject this self-serving sympathy ploy.
sentences.cn: 您应该拒绝这种自私自利的手段。

sentences.en: Banks' initial attack on fair value was self-serving.
sentences.cn: 由银行挑起的针对公平价值的攻击图得不过是一己私利。

sentences.en: At times it is little more than a self-serving diatribe.
sentences.cn: 有时这就是一个供自我谩骂发泄的平台。
